name: Mastery Talisman: Cold War
description:
The first Skill used or first Talent equipped by each of your characters per Round will cost 1 less Elemental Die.
Your Cryo-related Reactions deal +2 DMG.
descriptionraw: The first Skill used or first Talent equipped by each of your characters per Round will cost 1 less Elemental Die.\nYour Cryo-related Reactions deal +2 DMG.
